# The `SCEVVScale` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class represents the value of vscale, as used when defining the length of a scalable vector or returned by the llvm.vscale() intrinsic. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::SCEVVScale</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class represents the value of vscale, as used when defining the length of a scalable vector or returned by the llvm.vscale() intrinsic.
